org.openimaj.util.function.context

Class ContextAdaptor<ADAPTED,IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.function.context.ContextAdaptor<ADAPTED,IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ADAPTED - The type of object being adapted
    IN - The input type of the object being adapted
    OUT - The output type of the object being adapted
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextFunctionAdaptor, ContextListFilter, ContextListFunction, ContextOperationAdaptor, ContextPredicateAdaptor

    public abstract class ContextAdaptor<ADAPTED,IN,OUT>
extends Object
    Base class that holds the elements required to adapt something (i.e. a Function) to work around around a single element of a Context and output to a potentially different key of that Context.

    This base class just holds the parts required for the adaption (the object being adapted, and the ContextExtractor and ContextInsertor), but doesn't actually provide any functionality.

    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • ContextAdaptor

        public ContextAdaptor(ADAPTED inner,
              String keyin,
              String keyout)
        Construct with the given object to adapt. The insertor and extractor are created from the given keys.
        Parameters:
        inner - the object being adapted
        keyin - the key to extract from the context to produce the input for the object
        keyout - the key to insert with the the output for the object
